ðŸ“– Summary: The ai-renamer is a Node.js CLI tool that leverages AI models from Ollama, LM Studio, or OpenAI to intelligently rename files based on their content. It supports various models and offers customization options for case style, character limits, and language, making file management more efficient and intuitive.
